about_the_game:
What is ColorMinis

Our current ColorMinis apps on mobile offer a new 3D coloring experience, leveraging lightweight rendering innovations alongside a growing library of customizable 3D figures. Many products and themes are on display to express your unique designs: anime and fantasy tabletop minis, toys, chibis, and print-on-demand custom-colored figures.

Tool for Miniature Painters & 3D Art Enthusiasts

Use ColorMinis as a realistic preview tool to test color combinations and share with a creative community. It supports layered painting: Base, Shade, and Highlight.

Bringing Creations to Life

With backend integration ready, ColorMinis on Steam will soon let you bring your custom creations to life using the latest color 3D print technology.

Fun & Unique Experience

ColorMinis offers relaxing 3D coloring for all ages. Its intuitive features make it enjoyable for everyone looking to de-stress and color.

800+ Models Without Compromise

ColorMinis on Steam offers realistic previews with easy 360-degree coloring on over 800 models in 2 modes:

Classic Color Mode

Experiment with colors on high-quality models, experiencing realistic painting effects like dry-brush techniques. Live editing lets you intuitively improve your skills. Classic Color allows you to freely apply and adjust color layers for each part of your model using two main color selection tools.

Rainbow Strip

A vertical hue bar with adjustable saturation and a value slider to darken or brighten colors interactively.

Paint Palettes

Curated sets of colors from popular hobby paint brands. Navigate through 75 to 100 palettes using arrows, with colors organized into tri-shade groupings: Shadow, Base, and Highlight.

Paint Brands

Our palette system integrates triad paint combinations. With one button press, you apply all three shades (highlight, base, shade)  to a model part.

Info toggle

ColorMinis displays colors applied to the models in a list, helping you manage and optimize your colors.

Casual Coloring Game

Relax in this simple and inspiring color-by-number game mode where you touch the patterned part and advance through all the parts to reveal the final colors: showcasing the best coloring from Color Classic.

Model Editing

The Dressdolls models feature the part-swap that provide even more creative options.

Material Options

Switching a model part to Plastic, Metal, Skin, is a button press away and the change is immediately visible on the model.

Get new minis by:

Titan Forge, Twin Goddess, ESMonster, Artisan Guild, Nomnom, DiNamuu3D,,…

Airbrush Part Masking

With Airbrush feature, paint gradient color, and use the masking feature to avoid coloring other parts.

Color Print Orders from the App

With all the UVing and color output from the app, we’re excited to work with only-games.co to deliver detailed color prints.

New Materials for Everyone

Add stunning materials like glow, glass, glitter, and ice to all 800+ models in ColorMinis on Steam. By leveraging advanced GPU processing and real-time rendering, these new materials will elevate every creation. Your support makes this meaningful milestone possible for the entire community!

Add new projections, texture, and detail

Apply decals and texture projections, including video projections, to all models in ColorMinis on Steam. This new foundational tool will unleash limitless creative possibilities, allowing you to further customize your models like never before.

Single / Multiplayer Games

Battle termites attacking your aging wooden figures, or smash porcelain models in timed destruction. This feature adds fun mini-game experiences applied to all models.

Preview Minis in Virtual Space

Showcase your customized figures in immersive virtual reality showroom and experience your creations like never before. This feature is the first step toward integrating our unique coloring tools and experiences into VR.

ColorMinis Premium Subscription

Features ad-free access to a constantly growing collection of high detailed models, accessed on any mobile device or web browser through a universal customer Login that supports cross-device saves.

The user needs a subscription to immediately access all the figures in this collection. On mobile, many figures are available to color free after watching an ad.

Premium accounts unlock figures across iOS & Google Play app, and a premium user unlocks figures in ColorMinis on Steam as well..

Standard Size Personalized 3D Printed Figure

Receive a STANDARD SIZE personalized 3D printed figure, approximately 3-4 cm tall. Choose from a wide selection of models—we'll offer various options and ensure high-quality prints. Customize your figure with your own colors and designs for a unique keepsake.

Large Size Personalized 3D Printed Figure

Receive a LARGE SIZE personalized 3D printed figure, approximately 10-15 cm tall. Choose from a selection of models—we'll offer various options and ensure high-quality prints. Customize your figure with your own colors and designs for a unique keepsake.

Your Reward and Special Thanks!

GET YOUR  LIMITED EDITION SIMPLY MISSY 6-INCH PLASIC COLLECTIBLE

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: iOS 12 or later
  • Processor: A9 chip or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple’s integrated GPU (PowerVR or later)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card or onboard sound

name: ColorMinis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5750 with 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card or onboard sound

short_description: ColorMinis on Steam lets you color and customize over 800 3D fantasy, sci-fi, and anime miniature models with easy-to-use tools, in 2 modes, perfect for creatives of all ages.
